      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="filterTask" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
$ = skuid.$;

var field = arguments[0],
value = arguments[1];
//field.mode = 'read';
var $ = skuid.$;
var TaskforTaskModel = field.row;
var currentUserId = skuid.utils.userInfo.userId;
var taskOwnerId = TaskforTaskModel.OwnerId;

if(TaskforTaskModel.genesis__Task_Setup__c!=null) {
    if(taskOwnerId != currentUserId) {
        console.log('---1');
        value=TaskforTaskModel.IsClosed;
        //field.mode = 'read';
        //Custom Added to give CFA Admin user ability to check tasks
        field.mode = 'edit';
        var renderers = skuid.ui.fieldRenderers;
        var dt = field.metadata.displaytype;
        var r = renderers[dt];
        if (!r) r = renderers.TEXT;
        //return r.read(field,value);
        //Custom Added to give CFA Admin user ability to check tasks
        return r.edit(field,value);
    }
    else if(taskOwnerId === currentUserId && TaskforTaskModel.IsClosed) {
        console.log('---2');
        value=true;
        field.mode = 'read';
        var renderers = skuid.ui.fieldRenderers;
        var dt = field.metadata.displaytype;
        var r = renderers[dt];
        if (!r) r = renderers.TEXT;
        return r.read(field,value);
    }
    else if(taskOwnerId === currentUserId && TaskforTaskModel.IsClosed===false &&  TaskforTaskModel.genesis__Task_Setup__r.genesis__Auto_Close__c===false) {
        console.log('---3');
        value=false;
        field.mode = 'edit';
        var renderers = skuid.ui.fieldRenderers;
        var dt = field.metadata.displaytype;
        var r = renderers[dt];
        if (!r) r = renderers.TEXT;
        return r.edit(field,value);
    }
    else if(taskOwnerId === currentUserId && TaskforTaskModel.IsClosed===false && TaskforTaskModel.genesis__Task_Setup__r.genesis__Auto_Close__c===true) {
        console.log('---4');
        value=false;
        field.mode = 'read';
        var renderers = skuid.ui.fieldRenderers;
        var dt = field.metadata.displaytype;
        var r = renderers[dt];
        if (!r) r = renderers.TEXT;
        return r.read(field,value);
    }
}
else {
    if(taskOwnerId != currentUserId){
        console.log('---5');
        value=TaskforTaskModel.IsClosed;
        field.mode = 'read';
        var renderers = skuid.ui.fieldRenderers;
        var dt = field.metadata.displaytype;
        var r = renderers[dt];
        if (!r) r = renderers.TEXT;
        return r.read(field,value);
    }
    else if(taskOwnerId === currentUserId && TaskforTaskModel.IsClosed) {
        console.log('---6');
        value=true;
        field.mode = 'read';
        var renderers = skuid.ui.fieldRenderers;
        var dt = field.metadata.displaytype;
        var r = renderers[dt];
        if (!r) r = renderers.TEXT;
        return r.read(field,value);
    }
    else if(taskOwnerId === currentUserId){
        console.log('---7');
        value=false;

      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" cachelocation="false" name="EnableTaskBasedOnDepartment">
var params = arguments[0],
$ = skuid.$;

var ApplicationList=skuid.model.getModel('LDApplication');
applicationlistRow = ApplicationList.data;
var ProductDepartmentList=skuid.model.getModel('ProductDepartmentJunction');
productdepartmentlistRow=ProductDepartmentList.data;
var ActiveDepartmentList=skuid.model.getModel('AppDept');
activedepartmentlistRow=ActiveDepartmentList.data;
var TaskList=skuid.model.getModel('Task');
tasklistRow=TaskList.data;

var taskset=new Set();
for(var i=0;i<tasklistRow.length;i++) {
if(tasklistRow[i].genesis__Department__c!==null)
    taskset.add(tasklistRow[i].genesis__Department__c);
}

//getting Department_no_c for Active Application
var activeDeptNo=0;
var departmentforactiveapplication=null;
for(var i=0;i<activedepartmentlistRow.length;i++) {
if(activedepartmentlistRow[i].genesis__Status__c=='Active')
    departmentforactiveapplication=activedepartmentlistRow[i].genesis__Department__c;
}
if(departmentforactiveapplication!==null) {
    for(var i=0;i<productdepartmentlistRow.length;i++) {
        if(productdepartmentlistRow[i].genesis__Department__c==departmentforactiveapplication) {
            activeDeptNo=productdepartmentlistRow[i].genesis__Department_No__c;
        }
    }
}
if(applicationlistRow[0].genesis__CL_Product__c!==null) {
    if(productdepartmentlistRow.length>0) {
        for(var i=0;i<productdepartmentlistRow.length;i++) {
            if(activeDeptNo!==0) {
                for(var k=0;k<activeDeptNo-1;k++) {
                    var departmentNode=document.getElementsByClassName('nx-list-contents')[0].children[k].children[0].children[0];
                    departmentNode.style.setProperty("color","#00ae35");
                }
                if(productdepartmentlistRow[i].genesis__Department_No__c<=activeDeptNo) {
                    if(taskset.has(productdepartmentlistRow[i].genesis__Department__c)) {
                            return true;
                    }
                    else {
                        return false;
                    }
                }
                else {
                    return false;
                }
            }
            else {
                if(taskset.has(productdepartmentlistRow[i].genesis__Department__c)) {
                    return true;
                }
                else {
                    return false;
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
</jsitem>
      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="EnableTaskSetupBasedOnDepartment" cachelocation="false">
var params = arguments[0],
$ = skuid.$;
var ApplicationList=skuid.model.getModel('LDApplication');
applicationlistRow = ApplicationList.data;
var ProductDepartmentList=skuid.model.getModel('ProductDepartmentJunction');
productdepartmentlistRow=ProductDepartmentList.data;
var ActiveDepartmentList=skuid.model.getModel('AppDept');
activedepartmentlistRow=ActiveDepartmentList.data;
var TaskList=skuid.model.getModel('Task');
tasklistRow=TaskList.data;

var taskset=new Set();
for(var i=0;i<tasklistRow.length;i++) {
    if(tasklistRow[i].genesis__Department__c!==null) {
        taskset.add(tasklistRow[i].genesis__Department__c);
    }
}
var activeDeptNo=0;
var departmentforactiveapplication=null;
for(var i=0;i<activedepartmentlistRow.length;i++) {
    if(activedepartmentlistRow[i].genesis__Status__c=='Active') {
        departmentforactiveapplication=activedepartmentlistRow[i].genesis__Department__c;
    }
}
if(departmentforactiveapplication!==null) {
    for(var i=0;i<productdepartmentlistRow.length;i++) {
        if(productdepartmentlistRow[i].genesis__Department__c==departmentforactiveapplication)
        activeDeptNo=productdepartmentlistRow[i].genesis__Department_No__c;
    }
}
if(applicationlistRow[0].genesis__CL_Product__c!==null) {
    if(productdepartmentlistRow.length>0) {
        for(var i=0;i<productdepartmentlistRow.length;i++) {
            if(activeDeptNo!==0) {
                if(productdepartmentlistRow[i].genesis__Department_No__c<=activeDeptNo) {
                        if(taskset.has(productdepartmentlistRow[i].genesis__Department__c))
                                continue;
                        else
                            return true;
                }
                else {
                    return true;
                }
            }
            else {
                if(taskset.has(productdepartmentlistRow[i].genesis__Department__c)) {
                    continue;
                }
                else {
                    return true;
                }
            }
        }
    }
}

$ = skuid.$;

var ApplicationList=skuid.model.getModel('LDApplication');

for(var i=0;i<tasklistRow.length;i++) {
    if(tasklistRow[i].genesis__Department__c!==null)
        taskset.add(tasklistRow[i].genesis__Department__c);
}

//getting Department_no_c for Active Application
var activeDeptNo=0;
var departmentforactiveapplication=null;
for(var i=0;i<activedepartmentlistRow.length;i++) {
    if(activedepartmentlistRow[i].genesis__Status__c=='Active')
        departmentforactiveapplication=activedepartmentlistRow[i].genesis__Department__c;
}
if(departmentforactiveapplication!==null) {
    for(var i=0;i<productdepartmentlistRow.length;i++) {
        if(productdepartmentlistRow[i].genesis__Department__c==departmentforactiveapplication) {
            activeDeptNo=productdepartmentlistRow[i].genesis__Department_No__c;
        }
    }
}
var PrdoDepJunctList=skuid.model.getModel('ProductDepartmentJunction');
PrdoDepJunctListRow = PrdoDepJunctList.data;
var updates = {};
if(applicationlistRow[0].genesis__CL_Product__c !== null) {
    if(productdepartmentlistRow.length>0) {
        for(var i=0;i<productdepartmentlistRow.length;i++) {
            if(activeDeptNo!==0) {
                if(productdepartmentlistRow[i].genesis__Department_No__c<=activeDeptNo) {
                    if(taskset.has(productdepartmentlistRow[i].genesis__Department__c)) {
                        updates[PrdoDepJunctListRow[i].Id] = {
                            TaskSuccess:'Yes',

                        };

                        updates[PrdoDepJunctListRow[i].Id] = {

                        };

                }
                else {
                    updates[PrdoDepJunctListRow[i].Id] = {
                                TaskSuccess:'No',

                    };

            else {

                    };

                else {

                            TaskSuccess:'No',

                    };
                }

        }
    }

}

Name: RelationshipDashboard
skuid__Layout__c:
<skuidpage unsavedchangeswarning="yes" personalizationmode="server" showsidebar="false" showheader="false">
  <models>
    <model id="RDParty" limit="" query="true" createrowifnonefound="false" sobject="clcommon__Party__c" orderby="clcommon__Type__r.Name, clcommon__Account__r.Name" datasource="salesforce">
      <fields>
        <field id="clcommon__Account__r.Name"/>
        <field id="Name"/>
        <field id="Id"/>
        <field id="clcommon__Type__r.Name"/>
        <field id="clcommon__Account__c"/>
        <field id="genesis__Application__c"/>
        <field id="genesis__Application__r.Name"/>
        <field id="genesis__Is_Internal_User__c"/>
        <field id="Party Type" uionly="true" displaytype="TEXT" length="255" label="Party Type Ui"/>
        <field id="Multiselect" uionly="true" displaytype="TEXT" length="255" ogdisplaytype="TEXT" readonly="true" returntype="TEXT"/>
        <field id="clcommon__Account__r.clcommon__Email__c"/>
        <field id="clcommon__Account__r.Id"/>
        <field id="genesis__Application__r.Id"/>
      <field id="clcommon__Party_Types__c"/>
<field id="clcommon__Contact__r.Title"/><field id="clcommon__Contact__c"/><field id="clcommon__Contact__r.Name"/></fields>
      <conditions>
        <condition type="fieldvalue" value="false" enclosevalueinquotes="false" field="genesis__Is_Internal_User__c"/>
        <condition type="param" value="id" field="genesis__Application__c" operator="=" enclosevalueinquotes="true"/>
      </conditions>
      <actions>
        <action>
          <actions>
            <action type="custom" snippet="UpdateRelationshipIFrame"/>
          </actions>
          <events>
            <event>models.loaded</event>
          </events>
        </action>
      </actions>
    </model>
    <model id="RelationshipDashboard_ApplicationLockStatus" limit="20" query="true" createrowifnonefound="true" datasource="Ui-Only">
      <fields>
        <field id="RecordStatus" displaytype="BOOLEAN" length="255" label="Record Status" ogdisplaytype="TEXT" defaultvaluetype="param" defaultValue="isLocked" enclosevalueinquotes="false"/>
      </fields>
      <actions/>
    </model>
    <model id="PartyQueueModel" limit="20" query="true" createrowifnonefound="false" datasource="Ui-Only">
      <fields>
        <field id="PartyType" displaytype="TEXT" length="255" defaultvaluetype="fieldvalue"/>
        <field id="AccountName" displaytype="TEXT" length="255"/>
        <field id="AccountId" displaytype="TEXT" length="255" defaultvaluetype="fieldvalue"/>
        <field id="ContactId" displaytype="TEXT" length="255"/>
        <field id="partyId" displaytype="TEXT" length="255"/>
        <field id="CheckField" displaytype="TEXT" length="255"/>
        <field id="ApplicationID" displaytype="TEXT" length="255" defaultvaluetype="fieldvalue"/>
      <field displaytype="TEXT" length="255" id="Title" defaultvaluetype="fieldvalue" ogdisplaytype="TEXT"/></fields>
      <actions/>
    </model>
    <model id="displayPageInclude" limit="20" query="true" createrowifnonefound="true" datasource="Ui-Only" processonclient="true">
      <fields>
        <field id="partyRelationshipDetails" displaytype="BOOLEAN" length="255" ogdisplaytype="TEXT" defaultvaluetype="fieldvalue" defaultValue="false"/>
        <field id="multiplePartiesModel" displaytype="BOOLEAN" length="255" ogdisplaytype="TEXT" defaultvaluetype="fieldvalue" defaultValue="false"/>
      </fields>
      <conditions/>
      <actions/>
    </model>
  <model id="OrgParameters" limit="1" query="true" createrowifnonefound="false" datasource="salesforce" sobject="genesis__Org_Parameters__c">
<fields>
	<field id="genesis__Adjust_Rounding_in_last_Payment__c"/>
	<field id="genesis__Auto_Assign_Queue_Items__c"/>
	<field id="genesis__Closed_Satus__c"/>
	<field id="genesis__Consolidate_Parties_with_Same_Account__c"/>
	<field id="CreatedById"/>
	<field id="CreatedBy.Name"/>
	<field id="CreatedDate"/>
	<field id="genesis__Custom_Final_Application_Page__c"/>
	<field id="genesis__Custom_Pricing_Calculator__c"/>
	<field id="genesis__Custom_Yodlee_Post_Processor_Class__c"/>
	<field id="IsDeleted"/>
	<field id="genesis__Digits_After_Decimals__c"/>
	<field id="genesis__Disable_Rounding_In_AMZ_Schedule__c"/>
	<field id="genesis__Disable_Triggers__c"/>
	<field id="genesis__Enable_Backward_Stage_Movement__c"/>
	<field id="genesis__Enable_Criteria_Based_Task__c"/>
	<field id="genesis__End_Point_Name__c"/>
	<field id="genesis__Enumerate_Loan_Number_On_Application__c"/>
	<field id="genesis__Final_Payment_Differ__c"/>
	<field id="genesis__FinancialCalculatorVersion__c"/>
	<field id="genesis__Interest_Only_Period_Behavior__c"/>
</fields>
<conditions/>
<actions/>
</model>
</models>
  <components>
    <panelset type="custom" uniqueid="sk-1BxPAD-201">
      <panels>
        <panel width="33.3%">
          <components/>
        </panel>
        <panel width="33.3%">
          <components>
            <template multiple="false" uniqueid="sk-1BxCr1-184">
              <contents><div class="cls-page-title-header">No Parties To Display</div></contents>
            </template>
          </components>
        </panel>
        <panel width="33.3%">
          <components/>
        </panel>
      </panels>
      <renderconditions logictype="and">
        <rendercondition fieldmodel="RDParty" sourcetype="modelproperty" nosourcerowbehavior="deactivate" sourceproperty="hasNoRows"/>
      </renderconditions>
    </panelset>
    <panelset type="vertical" uniqueid="relationship-dashboard-panelset" cssclass="party-queue-panel">
      <panels>
        <panel width="20%" uniqueid="party-queue">
          <components>
            <queue tagrendertype="template" searchbox="true" tokenizesearch="true" showsearchbydefault="true" hideheader="false" hidefooter="false" uniqueid="relationship-queue" model="PartyQueueModel" cssclass="simple-queue" searchmethod="server" itemicon="sk-icon-members" rendersnippet="LoanQueue" emptysearchbehavior="query">
              <rendertemplate>{{AccountName}}
{{PartyType}}  &nbsp;&nbsp; {{Title}}</rendertemplate>
              <interactions>
                <interaction type="tap">
                  <action type="branch" whenfinished="stop" model="OrgParameters">
<iftrueactions>
	<action type="updateIncludePanel" pagename="ConsolidatedPartyRelationshipDetails" module="CLSbase" panelid="relationship-iframe3" querystring="id={{partyId}}&appId={{ApplicationID}}"/>
</iftrueactions>
<formula>{{genesis__Consolidate_Parties_with_Same_Account__c}}== true</formula>
</action>
<action type="branch" whenfinished="stop" model="PartyQueueModel">
                    <formula>{{{PartyType}}}==="MULTIPLE ROLES"</formula>
                    <iftrueactions>
                      <action type="custom" snippet="check"/>
                      <action type="save">
                        <models>
                          <model>displayPageInclude</model>
                        </models>
                      </action>
                      <action type="requeryModel" model="displayPageInclude" behavior="standard"/>
                      <action type="updateIncludePanel" pagename="PartyRelationshipDetailsMultipleParties" module="CLSbase" panelid="relationship-iframe2" querystring="id={{AccountId}}&appId={{ApplicationID}}"/>
                    </iftrueactions>
                  </action>
                  <action type="custom" snippet="refreshPageInclude"/>
                  <action type="save">
                    <models>
                      <model>displayPageInclude</model>
                    </models>
                  </action>
                  <action type="requeryModel" model="displayPageInclude" behavior="standard"/>
                  <action type="updateIncludePanel" querystring="id={{partyId}}&appId={{ApplicationID}}" pagename="PartyRelationshipDetails" module="CLSbase" panelid="relationship-iframe"/>
                </interaction>
              </interactions>
              <renderconditions logictype="and"/>
            </queue>
          </components>
        </panel>
        <panel type="left" uniqueid="party-container">
          <components>
            <includepanel type="skuid" uniqueid="relationship-iframe" querystring="?id={{{$Model.PartyQueueModel.data.0.partyId}}}&isLocked={{{$Model.RelationshipDashboard_ApplicationLockStatus.data.0.RecordStatus}}}&appId={{{$Model.PartyQueueModel.data.0.ApplicationID}}}" lazyload="true" showloading="false" pagename="PartyRelationshipDetails" module="CLSbase">
              <renderconditions logictype="and">
                <rendercondition type="fieldvalue" operator="=" enclosevalueinquotes="false" fieldmodel="displayPageInclude" sourcetype="fieldvalue" nosourcerowbehavior="deactivate" field="partyRelationshipDetails" value="true"/>
              <rendercondition type="fieldvalue" operator="=" enclosevalueinquotes="false" fieldmodel="OrgParameters" sourcetype="fieldvalue" nosourcerowbehavior="deactivate" field="genesis__Consolidate_Parties_with_Same_Account__c" fieldtargetobjects="genesis__Org_Parameters__c" value="false"/>
</renderconditions>
            </includepanel>
            <includepanel type="skuid" uniqueid="relationship-iframe2" pagename="PartyRelationshipDetailsMultipleParties" module="CLSbase" querystring="?id={{{$Model.PartyQueueModel.data.0.AccountId}}}&isLocked={{{$Model.RelationshipDashboard_ApplicationLockStatus.data.0.RecordStatus}}}&appId={{{$Model.PartyQueueModel.data.0.ApplicationID}}}" lazyload="true" showloading="false">
              <renderconditions logictype="and">
                <rendercondition type="fieldvalue" operator="=" enclosevalueinquotes="false" fieldmodel="displayPageInclude" sourcetype="fieldvalue" nosourcerowbehavior="deactivate" field="multiplePartiesModel" value="true"/>
              <rendercondition type="fieldvalue" operator="=" enclosevalueinquotes="false" fieldmodel="OrgParameters" sourcetype="fieldvalue" nosourcerowbehavior="deactivate" field="genesis__Consolidate_Parties_with_Same_Account__c" fieldtargetobjects="genesis__Org_Parameters__c" value="false"/>
</renderconditions>
            </includepanel>
<includepanel type="skuid" uniqueid="relationship-iframe3" pagename="ConsolidatedPartyRelationshipDetails" module="CLSbase" querystring="?id={{{$Model.PartyQueueModel.data.0.AccountId}}}&isLocked={{{$Model.RelationshipDashboard_ApplicationLockStatus.data.0.RecordStatus}}}&appId={{{$Model.PartyQueueModel.data.0.ApplicationID}}}">
	<renderconditions logictype="and">
		<rendercondition type="fieldvalue" operator="=" enclosevalueinquotes="false" fieldmodel="OrgParameters" sourcetype="fieldvalue" nosourcerowbehavior="deactivate" field="genesis__Consolidate_Parties_with_Same_Account__c" fieldtargetobjects="genesis__Org_Parameters__c" value="true"/>
	</renderconditions>
</includepanel>
          </components>
        </panel>
      </panels>
      <renderconditions logictype="and">
        <rendercondition type="fieldvalue" enclosevalueinquotes="true" fieldmodel="RDParty" sourcetype="modelproperty" nosourcerowbehavior="deactivate" sourceproperty="hasRows"/>
      </renderconditions>
    </panelset>
  </components>
  <resources>
    <labels/>

      <jsitem location="staticresource" name="CLSNGUIComponent" cachelocation="false" url="" namespace="genesisExtn" filepath="commonUtils.js">var params = arguments[0],

</jsitem>

$($('#relationship-queue .nx-item.nx-queue-item')[0]).trigger('click');
</jsitem>
      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" cachelocation="false" name="LoanQueue">var params = arguments[0],
	$ = skuid.$;
var PartyModel = skuid.model.getModel('RDParty');
var newPartyRow = PartyModel.getRows();

var orgParamModel = skuid.model.getModel('OrgParameters');


var prevID =PartyModel.data[0].clcommon__Account__r.Id;
var prevName = PartyModel.data[0].clcommon__Account__r.Name;
var partyType = PartyModel.data[0].clcommon__Type__r.Name;

var mapForMultipleParties = new Map();
var flag=0;
var UIPartyModel = skuid.model.getModel('PartyQueueModel');

var newChargeRow=new Array();
//mapForMultipleParties.set(PartyModel.data[0].clcommon__Account__r.Id, 1);
$.each(PartyModel.getRows(),function(i,row){
    //added by Pritam Roy
    if(row.clcommon__Contact__c != undefined && row.clcommon__Type__r.Name == 'PRINCIPAL'){
        if(orgParamModel.data[0].genesis__Consolidate_Parties_with_Same_Account__c == false){
            if(mapForMultipleParties.has(row.clcommon__Account__r.Id)){
                UIPartyModel.updateRow(newChargeRow[mapForMultipleParties.get(row.clcommon__Account__r.Id)],
                                     {'PartyType' : 'MULTIPLE ROLES',
                                      'AccountName' : row.clcommon__Account__r.Name,
                                      'AccountId' : row.clcommon__Account__r.Id,
                                      'partyId' : row.Id,
                                      'ApplicationID' : row.genesis__Application__c,
                                      'Title' :  row.clcommon__Contact__r.Title
                });   
            }
            else{
                mapForMultipleParties.set(row.clcommon__Account__r.Id,flag);
                newChargeRow[flag] = UIPartyModel.createRow({
                additionalConditions: [
                    { field: 'PartyType', value: row.clcommon__Type__r.Name },
                    { field: 'AccountName' , value: row.clcommon__Account__r.Name },
                    { field: 'AccountId' , value: row.clcommon__Account__r.Id },
                    { field: 'partyId' , value: row.Id },
                    {field: 'ApplicationID' , value: row.genesis__Application__c},
                    {field: 'Title', value: row.clcommon__Contact__r.Title}
                ]});
                flag++;
            }
        }
        else{
              var partyTypes = row.clcommon__Party_Types__c;
              if(partyTypes.includes(';')){
                    newChargeRow[flag] = UIPartyModel.createRow({
                    additionalConditions: [
                        { field: 'PartyType', value:'MULTIPLE ROLES' },
                        { field: 'AccountName' , value: row.clcommon__Account__r.Name },
                        { field: 'AccountId' , value: row.clcommon__Account__r.Id },
                        { field: 'partyId' , value: row.Id },
                        {field: 'ApplicationID' , value: row.genesis__Application__c},
                        {field: 'Title', value: row.clcommon__Contact__r.Title}
                    ]
                    }); 
                flag++;
                }
            else{
                mapForMultipleParties.set(row.clcommon__Account__r.Id,flag);
                newChargeRow[flag] = UIPartyModel.createRow({
                additionalConditions: [
                    { field: 'PartyType', value: row.clcommon__Type__r.Name },
                    { field: 'AccountName' , value: row.clcommon__Account__r.Name },
                    { field: 'AccountId' , value: row.clcommon__Account__r.Id },
                    { field: 'partyId' , value: row.Id },
                    {field: 'ApplicationID' , value: row.genesis__Application__c},
                    {field: 'Title', value: row.clcommon__Contact__r.Title}
                ]
                });
                flag++;
            }
        }
    return;
    }
    if(orgParamModel.data[0].genesis__Consolidate_Parties_with_Same_Account__c == false){
        if(mapForMultipleParties.has(row.clcommon__Account__r.Id)){
            UIPartyModel.updateRow(newChargeRow[mapForMultipleParties.get(row.clcommon__Account__r.Id)],
                                 {'PartyType' : 'MULTIPLE ROLES',
                                  'AccountName' : row.clcommon__Account__r.Name,
                                  'AccountId' : row.clcommon__Account__r.Id,
                                  'partyId' : row.Id,
                                  'ApplicationID' : row.genesis__Application__c
            });
        }
        else{
            mapForMultipleParties.set(row.clcommon__Account__r.Id,flag);
            newChargeRow[flag] = UIPartyModel.createRow({
            additionalConditions: [
                { field: 'PartyType', value: row.clcommon__Type__r.Name },
                { field: 'AccountName' , value: row.clcommon__Account__r.Name },
                { field: 'AccountId' , value: row.clcommon__Account__r.Id },
                { field: 'partyId' , value: row.Id },
                {field: 'ApplicationID' , value: row.genesis__Application__c}
            ]
        });
        flag++;
        }
    }
    else{
        var partyTypes = row.clcommon__Party_Types__c;
        if(partyTypes.includes(';')){
            newChargeRow[flag] = UIPartyModel.createRow({
            additionalConditions: [
                { field: 'PartyType', value:'MULTIPLE ROLES' },
                { field: 'AccountName' , value: row.clcommon__Account__r.Name },
                { field: 'AccountId' , value: row.clcommon__Account__r.Id },
                { field: 'partyId' , value: row.Id },
                {field: 'ApplicationID' , value: row.genesis__Application__c}
            ]
            }); 
            flag++;
        }
        else{
            mapForMultipleParties.set(row.clcommon__Account__r.Id,flag);
            newChargeRow[flag] = UIPartyModel.createRow({
            additionalConditions: [
                { field: 'PartyType', value: row.clcommon__Type__r.Name },
                { field: 'AccountName' , value: row.clcommon__Account__r.Name },
                { field: 'AccountId' , value: row.clcommon__Account__r.Id },
                { field: 'partyId' , value: row.Id },
                {field: 'ApplicationID' , value: row.genesis__Application__c}
            ]
            });
            flag++;
        }
    }
}
);</jsitem>

      <cssitem location="inline" name="simple-queue" cachelocation="false">.party-queue-panel .nx-queue-header {
    display: none;
}

.party-queue-panel .nx-list-footer {
    display: none;
}

.party-queue-panel .simple-queue.nx-queue {
    border-top: 0;
}

.party-queue-panel .nx-queue-item{
    color: white;
}
.party-queue-panel .nx-queue-item-inner-with-icon {
    height: 30px;
}

.party-queue-panel .sk-icon {
    width: 30px;
    height: 30px;
    line-height: 30px;
    border-radius: 50%;
    border: 2px solid white;
    margin: 0 15px 0 0;
}

 /*to get the font content, go https://astronautweb.co/snippet/font-awesome/ */

.party-queue-panel .sk-icon.sk-icon-members:before {
    font-family: FontAwesome;
    content: "\f007";
    padding: 4px;
    font-size: 20px;
    vertical-align: middle;
}

.party-queue-panel .nx-item.nx-queue-item.nx-queue-item-selected > .nx-queue-item-inner {
    color: white;
}

.party-queue-panel .nx-item.nx-queue-item.nx-queue-item-selected .sk-icon {
    color: #48ce94;
    border: 2px solid #48ce94;
}

.party-queue-panel .nx-item.nx-queue-item {
    border-left: 5px solid #7f7f7f;
    background: #7f7f7f;
}

.party-queue-panel .nx-item.nx-queue-item .nx-template {
    white-space: nowrap;
    overflow: hidden;
    text-overflow: ellipsis;
}

.party-queue-panel .nx-item.nx-queue-item .nx-queue-loader {
    display: none;
}

.party-queue-panel .nx-item.nx-queue-item:hover {
    border-left: 5px solid #2d5074;
}

.party-queue-panel .nx-item.nx-queue-item.nx-queue-item-selected {
    border-left: 5px solid #48ce94;
}</cssitem>

      <jsitem location="inline" name="loadModels" cachelocation="false" url="">(function(skuid){
	var $ = skuid.$;
	$(document.body).one('pageload',function(){
	    var paramId = skuid.page.params.id;
	    var dealAppParamModel = skuid.model.getModel('DealAppParam');
	    
	    var pageName = undefined;
	    
	    if(dealAppParamModel && dealAppParamModel.data.length>0){
	        pageName = dealAppParamModel.data[0].PageName;
	    }
	    if(pageName && pageName == 'AddDealsToPackage'){
	        var selectedProductModel = skuid.model.getModel('SelectedProduct');
            var selectedProductRow = selectedProductModel.data[0];
	        var sql = "SELECT Id, Name, DeveloperName, SobjectType FROM RecordType where Name = \'" + selectedProductRow.RecordType.Name + "\' AND SobjectType  = 'genesis__Applications__c' ";
            var result = sforce.connection.query(sql);
            var recordsArr = result.getArray('records');
	        var newRow = skuid.model.getModel('GeneralLoanApplication').createRow({
	             additionalConditions: [{ field: 'genesis__Parent_Application__c', value: paramId },
	             { field: 'RecordTypeId', value: recordsArr[0].Id },
	             { field: 'genesis__Product_Type__c' , value : 'LOAN'},
	             //Custom Added by Subham starts----
	             { field: 'genesis__Pricing_Method__c', value : 'RATE CARD'}]
	             //Custom Added by Subham ends------
	        });
	    } else{
    	    if(paramId){
        	    queryApplication(paramId);
        	}else{
        	    var newRow = skuid.model.getModel('GeneralLoanApplication').createRow({
        	        additionalConditions: [
                        { field: 'RecordTypeId', value: skuid.page.params.RecordType},
                         { field: 'genesis__Product_Type__c' , value : 'LOAN'},
                         //Custom Added by Subham starts----
        	             { field: 'genesis__Pricing_Method__c', value : 'RATE CARD'}
        	             //Custom Added by Subham ends------
        	             ]
        	    });
        	}
	    }
	});
})(skuid);

function queryApplication(id){
    var applicationModel = skuid.model.getModel('GeneralLoanApplication');
    var appIdCondition = applicationModel.getConditionByName('AppId');
    applicationModel.setCondition(appIdCondition,id);
    skuid.model.updateData([applicationModel],function(){});
}
</jsitem>
      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="fieldsRenderMode" cachelocation="false">var field = arguments[0],
value = arguments[1];
var renderMode = skuid.page.params.mode;

skuid.ui.fieldRenderers[field.metadata.displaytype].read(field, value);
}else{
skuid.ui.fieldRenderers[field.metadata.displaytype].edit(field, value);
}
</jsitem>
      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="getIncludedPageData" cachelocation="false" url="">var params = arguments[0],
$ = skuid.$;
var productRow = skuid.model.getModel('GeneralLoanCLProduct').getFirstRow();
var applicationModel = skuid.model.getModel('GeneralLoanApplication');
var ApplicationOldValues = skuid.model.getModel('ApplicationOldValues');
if(applicationModel && applicationModel.data && applicationModel.data[0] && productRow){
applicationModel.data[0].genesis__CL_Product__c = productRow.Id;
}
var result = {
'genesis__Applications__c' : applicationModel,
'ApplicationOldValues' : ApplicationOldValues,
};

return result;

</jsitem>

    $ = skuid.$;

// Handle error messages
var displayMessage = function (message, severity) {
    var editor = $('#pledge-collateral-title-id ').data('object').editor;
    editor.handleMessages([
        {
            message: message,
            severity: severity.toUpperCase()
        }
    ]);

    return false;
};


var appColRowForPledgeAmt = skuid.model.getModel('AppCollateralAssociation').getFirstRow();
var appColRowForRemainingVal = skuid.model.getModel('CollateralDetailView_CollateralValuation').getFirstRow();
var appColRowForPreviousPledgeAmt = skuid.model.getModel('CollateralDetailView_ApplicationCollateralForPreviousPledgeAmount').getFirstRow();



var pledgeAmt;
var remainingAmt;
var previousPledgeAmt;

if(appColRowForPledgeAmt !== undefined) {
    pledgeAmt = appColRowForPledgeAmt.genesis__Pledge_Amount__c;
}


if(appColRowForPreviousPledgeAmt !== undefined) {
    previousPledgeAmt = appColRowForPreviousPledgeAmt.genesis__Pledge_Amount__c;
}
if(previousPledgeAmt === undefined) {
    previousPledgeAmt = 0;
}

if(appColRowForRemainingVal !== undefined) {
    remainingAmt = appColRowForRemainingVal.RemainingValue;
    if(isNaN(Number.parseFloat(pledgeAmt))) {
        return displayMessage('The collateral pledge amount should be a number ', 'ERROR');
    }else if(pledgeAmt < 0) {
        return displayMessage('The collateral pledge amount cannot be less than 0 ', 'ERROR');
    } else if(pledgeAmt - previousPledgeAmt > 0 && pledgeAmt - previousPledgeAmt > remainingAmt) {
        /* throw error message; return false */
        return displayMessage('The collateral pledge amount cannot exceed the available appraised value remaining for the collateral ', 'ERROR');
    } else {
        /* return true;*/
        return true;
    }
}

return true;

</jsitem><jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="updateRemainingValue" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
    $ = skuid.$;


var collValModel = skuid.model.getModel('CollateralDetailView_CollateralValuation');
var collValRow = collValModel.getFirstRow();

var allAppForCollateralModel = skuid.model.getModel('CollateralDetailView_ApplicationCollateral');
var allAppForCollateralList = allAppForCollateralModel.data;

var total_pledge_amt = 0;

if(allAppForCollateralList !== undefined) {
    /* sum all pledge amount across all application for this collateral */
    $.each(allAppForCollateralList, function(fieldId,appColRow) {
        $.each(appColRow,function(fieldName,val) {
            if ((fieldName != 'attributes') && (fieldName === 'genesis__Pledge_Amount__c')) {
                if(val !== undefined && val !== null) {
                    total_pledge_amt = total_pledge_amt + val;


                }

            }
        });
    });
    if(collValRow !== undefined) {
        /* update remianing value = Appraisaed_Value -Sum(Pledge_Amount across other loan application) */
        collValModel.updateRow(collValRow,{
             RemainingValue: collValRow.clcommon__Appraised_Value__c - total_pledge_amt
        });
    }
}

</jsitem><jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="saveCollateralLienForApplication" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
$ = skuid.$;

var applicationCollateralLienPanel = $('#collateralLienPanel');
var editor = applicationCollateralLienPanel.data('object').editor;
editor.clearMessages();

var collateralDetailView = skuid.model.getModel('CollateralDetailView_CollateralValuation');
var collateralLien = skuid.model.getModel('CollateralLien');

var appCollateralAssociation = skuid.model.getModel('AppCollateralAssociation');
appCollateralAssociation = appCollateralAssociation.data[0];
for(var key in appCollateralAssociation) {
    if(key.indexOf("__c", key.length - 3) === -1) {
        delete appCollateralAssociation[key];
    }
}

var appCollateralLien = skuid.model.getModel('ApplicationCollateralLien');
var appCollateralLienRow = appCollateralLien.data[0];
for(var key in appCollateralLienRow) {
    if(key.indexOf("__c", key.length - 3) === -1) {
        delete appCollateralLienRow[key];
    }
}
var lienPosition = appCollateralLienRow.clcommon__Lien_Position__c;
var res =true;

if(null==lienPosition || null==appCollateralAssociation.genesis__Pledge_Amount__c || ''==lienPosition || ''==appCollateralAssociation.genesis__Pledge_Amount__c){

    res = false;
    editor.handleMessages(
    [
        {
            message: 'Lien position and amount are required to save lien details.',
            severity: 'ERROR'
        },
    ]);
    return;
}

if(isNaN(lienPosition) || isNaN(appCollateralAssociation.genesis__Pledge_Amount__c) ) {	
    res = false;	
    editor.handleMessages ([{	
        message: 'Invalid Lien Position/ Lien Amount.',	
        severity: 'ERROR'	},	
    ]);	
    return;	
}	
if(lienPosition<0 || (appCollateralAssociation.genesis__Pledge_Amount__c)<0) {	
    res = false;	
    editor.handleMessages ([{	
        message: 'Lien position and Lien Amount can\'t be negative',	
        severity: 'ERROR'  },	
    ]);	
    return;	
}

if(lienPosition==0){
    res = false;
    editor.handleMessages(
    [
        {
            message: 'Lien position can\'t be 0',
            severity: 'ERROR'
        },
    ]);
    return;
}

var collateralLiens = skuid.model.getModel('CollateralLien');
var applicationCollaterals = skuid.model.getModel('ApplicationCollaterals');
$.each(collateralLiens.data,function(i,row){
    let position = -1;
    if(row.clcommon__Status__c == 'Open' || row.clcommon__Status__c =='Proposed'){
        position = row.clcommon__Lien_Position__c;
    }
    
    
    if(position==lienPosition)
    {
        editor.handleMessages(
        [
            {
                message: 'Duplicate Lien Position found!',
                severity: 'ERROR'
            },
        ]);
        res = false;
    }
});

if(res===true)
{
    try{
        var result = sforce.apex.execute('genesis.CollateralLienSaveAndUpdateActions','saveOrUpdateApplicationCollateralLien',{
            appCollLienParams : JSON.stringify(appCollateralLienRow),
            appCollAssociationParams : JSON.stringify(appCollateralAssociation)
       });
       collateralDetailView.updateData();
       collateralLien.updateData();
       applicationCollaterals.updateData();	
    }
    catch(err) {
        editor.handleMessages(
        [
            {
                message: 'Unable to save Lien! ' + err,
                severity: 'ERROR'
            },
        ]);
    }

    if (!result.includes('Succesfully saved')){
        editor.handleMessages(
        [
            {
                message: 'Unable to save Lien! ' + result,
                severity: 'ERROR'
            },
        ]);
    }
    else {
         editor.handleMessages(
        [
            {
                message: 'Lien saved successfully!',
                severity: 'INFO'
            },
        ]);
        var appliationModel = skuid.model.getModel('ApplicationForCollateral');
        var appRow = appliationModel.getFirstRow();
        var returnMsg = sforce.apex.execute('genesis.ComputeLoanToValueRatio', 'computeLTVandCLTV', { applicationId : appRow.Id,
                                                                                                      paramsMapJson : ''
                                                                                                    });

        if (returnMsg === undefined || !returnMsg[0].includes("success")) {
            editor.handleMessages([
                {
                  message: 'Unable to calculate LTV and CLTV : ' + returnMsg[0],
                  severity: 'ERROR'
                }
            ]);
        }
        else {
            editor.handleMessages([
                {
                  message: 'LTV and CLTV calculated successfully!',
                  severity: 'INFO'
                }
            ]);
        }
    }

application.cancel();</jsitem><jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="rejectDuplicates" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
    $ = skuid.$;
var collateralLienTable = $('#collateralLienTable');
var editor = collateralLienTable.data('object').editor;
editor.clearMessages();

var existingLienPositions = [];
var applicationCollateralLien = skuid.model.getModel('ApplicationCollateralLien');
applicationCollateralLien = applicationCollateralLien.data[0];

if(applicationCollateralLien.clcommon__Status__c == 'Open' || applicationCollateralLien.clcommon__Status__c =='Proposed'){
    existingLienPositions.push(applicationCollateralLien.clcommon__Lien_Position__c);
}

var collateralLiens = skuid.model.getModel('CollateralLien');
var res =true;
var row_count =1;
var deleteRowCheck;
$.each(collateralLiens.data,function(i,row){
    deleteRowCheck=false;
    let applicationLoan;
    if(null!=row.genesis__Application__c){
         if(typeof(row.genesis__Application__r.genesis__Loan_Amount__c) !== 'undefined')        {
            applicationLoan = row.genesis__Application__r.genesis__Loan_Amount__c;
        }else{
            applicationLoan = 0;
        }
    }else{
        applicationLoan = null;
    }

    // This is to ensure that we are able to delete the newly added empty rows by surpassing the 'Required' functionality of various fields
    let row_element = document.getElementsByTagName('tr')[row_count];
    if(row_element.outerHTML.includes('nx-item deleted')){
        deleteRowCheck = true;
        row.clcommon__Bank__c = 'Dummy Bank';
        row.clcommon__Lien_Amount__c = 0.0;
        row.clcommon__Lien_Position__c = 0;
    }

    if(!deleteRowCheck && row.clcommon__Lien_Position__c==0){
        res = false;
        editor.handleMessages([
            {
                message: 'Lien position can\'t be 0 or blank',
                severity: 'ERROR'
            },
        ]);
        return;
    }


    //Verifying if all the required fields are entered in the rows to be saved/updated (excluding the rows to be deleted)
    if(!deleteRowCheck && (
       typeof(row.clcommon__Lien_Amount__c) == 'undefined' ||
       typeof(row.clcommon__Lien_Position__c) == 'undefined' ||
        null==row.clcommon__Lien_Amount__c ||
       null==row.clcommon__Lien_Position__c  ||
       row.clcommon__Lien_Amount__c == '' || row.clcommon__Lien_Position__c=='' ||
       (applicationLoan == null && row.LoanAmount  == ''))){
        res = false;
        editor.handleMessages([
            {
                message: ' Lien Amount, Lien Position and Loan Amount are mandatory fields. Please ensure to enter values for these!',
                severity: 'ERROR'
            },
        ]);
        return;
    }
    var lienAmount = ''+row.clcommon__Lien_Amount__c;
    var loanAmount = ''+row.LoanAmount;
    var lienPosition = ''+row.clcommon__Lien_Position__c;
    if(isNaN(lienAmount) || isNaN(lienPosition) ){
        res = false;
        editor.handleMessages([
            {
                message: 'Invalid format.',
                severity: 'ERROR'
            },
        ]);
        return;
    }
    if(lienAmount.includes('-') || loanAmount.includes('-') || lienPosition.includes('-')){
        res = false;
        editor.handleMessages([
            {
                message: 'Invalid format. Can\'t save negative values.',
                severity: 'ERROR'
            },
        ]);
        return;
    }


    let position = row.clcommon__Lien_Position__c;
    if(!deleteRowCheck && existingLienPositions.includes(position)){

        res = false;
        editor.handleMessages([
          {
              message: 'Duplicate Lien Position found!',
              severity: 'ERROR'
          },
        ]);
        return
    }
    if(row.clcommon__Status__c == 'Open' || row.clcommon__Status__c =='Proposed'){
        existingLienPositions.push(position);
    }
    
    row_count++;
});
if(res===true){
    $.each(collateralLiens.data,function(i,row){
        let loan;
        if(typeof(row.genesis__Application__r)!=='undefined'){
            loan = row.genesis__Application__r.genesis__Loan_Amount__c;
        }else if(typeof(row.LoanAmount)!=='undefined'){
            loan = row.LoanAmount;
        }else if(typeof(row.clcommon__Loan_Amount__c)!=='undefined'){
            loan = row.clcommon__Loan_Amount__c;
        }else{
             loan = 0.0;
        }
        collateralLiens.updateRow(row, {
            clcommon__Loan_Amount__c: loan
        });

    });
    collateralLiens.save();
    editor.handleMessages([
        {
          message: 'Collateral Liens updated successfully!',
          severity: 'INFO'
        }
    ]);

    var appliationModel = skuid.model.getModel('ApplicationForCollateral');
    var appRow = appliationModel.getFirstRow();
    var returnMsg = sforce.apex.execute('genesis.ComputeLoanToValueRatio', 'computeLTVandCLTV', { applicationId : appRow.Id,
                                                                                                  paramsMapJson : ''
                                                                                                });
    if (returnMsg === undefined || !returnMsg[0].includes("success")) {
        editor.handleMessages([
            {
              message: 'Unable to calculate LTV and CLTV : ' + returnMsg[0],
              severity: 'INFO'
            }
        ]);
        return false;
    }
    else {
        editor.handleMessages([
            {
              message: 'LTV and CLTV calculated successfully!',
              severity: 'INFO'
            }
        ]);
    }
}</jsitem><jsitem location="inlinesnippet" cachelocation="false" name="makingLoanConditionallyEditable">var params = arguments[0],
    $ = skuid.$;

var field = arguments[0];
var value = arguments[1];

var collateralLien = field.row;

if(null!=collateralLien.genesis__Application__c){
    let loan_amount;
    if(typeof(collateralLien.genesis__Application__r.genesis__Loan_Amount__c) !== 'undefined')        {
        loan_amount = collateralLien.genesis__Application__r.genesis__Loan_Amount__c;
    }else{
        loan_amount = 0;
    }
    value=loan_amount;
    return skuid.ui.getFieldRenderer(field.metadata.displaytype).read( field, value );
}
else{
    try{
        if(typeof(collateralLien.clcommon__Loan_Amount__c) !== 'undefined'){
            value=collateralLien.clcommon__Loan_Amount__c;
        }
        else{
            value=0.0;
        }
    }catch(e){
        value=0.0;
    }
    return skuid.ui.getFieldRenderer(field.metadata.displaytype).edit( field, value );
}

</jsitem><jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="updateLienAmount" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
	$ = skuid.$;

var applicationModel = skuid.model.getModel('ApplicationForCollateral');
var applicationRow = applicationModel.data[0];

var AppCollateralAssociationModel = skuid.model.getModel('AppCollateralAssociation');
var AppCollateralAssociationRow = AppCollateralAssociationModel.data[0];

if(applicationModel !== undefined){
    if(applicationRow !== undefined){

        if(applicationRow.genesis__Product_Type__c == 'LOAN'){

                AppCollateralAssociationModel.updateRow(AppCollateralAssociationRow,
                           {
                               'genesis__Pledge_Amount__c' : applicationRow.genesis__Loan_Amount__c
                           }); 
                
        }
        else if(applicationRow.genesis__Product_Type__c == 'LINE OF CREDIT'){

                AppCollateralAssociationModel.updateRow(AppCollateralAssociationRow,
                           {
                               'genesis__Pledge_Amount__c' : applicationRow.genesis__Credit_Limit__c
    
                               
                           });   
        }
        else if(applicationRow.genesis__Product_Type__c == 'PACKAGE'){

                AppCollateralAssociationModel.updateRow(AppCollateralAssociationRow,
                           {
                               'genesis__Pledge_Amount__c' : applicationRow.genesis__Loan_Amount__c
    
                               
                           });   
        }
    }

      (function(skuid){
    var $ = skuid.$;
    $(document.body).one('pageload',function(){
        // determine sobject type and prefix
        if(skuid.page.params.id){
            getDataFromId();
        } else if(skuid.page.params.sobjecttype){
            getDataFromSobjectType();
        } else {
            skuid.page.params.sobjecttype = 'genesis__Applications__c';
            getDataFromSobjectType();
        }
        // show button labels as icons
        showIconicBtnLabelAsTooltip();
    });

    // determine sobject type and prefix from param id
    function getDataFromId(){
        var sobjectPrefix = skuid.page.params.id.substring(0,3);
        if(sobjectPrefix != undefined) {
            var sobjectType = getSobjectType(sobjectPrefix);
            updateUIModel(sobjectType, sobjectPrefix);
        }
    }

    // determine sobject type and prefix from param sobjecttype
    function getDataFromSobjectType(){
        var sobjectType = skuid.page.params.sobjecttype;
        if(sobjectType != undefined) {
            var sobjectPrefix = getSobjectPrefix(sobjectType);
            updateUIModel(sobjectType, sobjectPrefix);
        }
    }

    //create a new row in model to set sobject type and prefix
    function updateUIModel(sobjectType, sobjectPrefix){
      if(sobjectType != undefined && sobjectPrefix != undefined) {
        skuid.$M("GH_AnySObjectModel").createRow({
            additionalConditions: [
                { field: 'SObjectType', value: sobjectType},
                { field: 'Prefix', value: sobjectPrefix},
            ], doAppend: true
        });
      }
    }

    // get sobject name from sobject prefix
    function getSobjectType(prefix) {
        var selectedObjectType;

        if(skuid.$M("GH_AnyAttachmentModel").getField("ParentId") != undefined) {
          skuid.$M("GH_AnyAttachmentModel").getField("ParentId").referenceTo.forEach(function(relatedObject){
              if(relatedObject.keyPrefix == prefix){
                  selectedObjectType = relatedObject.objectName;
                  return false;
              }
          });
        }
        return selectedObjectType;
    }

    // get sobject prefix from sobject type
    function getSobjectPrefix(sobjectType) {
        var prefix;
        // skuid gets object prefix for any polymorphic fields like parentid field on attachment
        if(skuid.$M("GH_AnyAttachmentModel").getField("ParentId") != undefined) {
          skuid.$M("GH_AnyAttachmentModel").getField("ParentId").referenceTo.forEach(function(relatedObject){
              if(relatedObject.objectName == sobjectType){
                  prefix = relatedObject.keyPrefix;
                  return false;
              }
          });
        }
        return prefix;
    }

    $ = skuid.$;
var appdata = skuid.model.getModel('ApplicationModel');
var approw = appdata.data[0];

var partyData = skuid.model.getModel('BorrowerModel');
var partyRow = partyData.data[0];
var copartyData = skuid.model.getModel('CoBorrowerModel');
var copartyRow = copartyData.data[0];
try{
    var creditdata = sforce.connection.query("SELECT Id,Name,genesis__Applications__c,genesis__Fico_Score__c FROM ints__Credit_Report__c WHERE genesis__Applications__c ='"+ approw.Id +"' ORDER BY CreatedDate DESC LIMIT 1 ");
    var creditrow = creditdata.getArray("records");
    
    var copartyData = sforce.connection.query("SELECT Id,Name,clcommon__Account__c,genesis__Application__c,clcommon__Contact__c FROM clcommon__Party__c WHERE genesis__Application__c ='"+ approw.Id +"' AND clcommon__Type__r.Name = 'CO-BORROWER' ORDER BY CreatedDate DESC LIMIT 1 ");
    var copartyRow = copartyData.getArray("records");
    
    var partyData = sforce.connection.query("SELECT Id,Name,clcommon__Account__c,genesis__Application__c,clcommon__Contact__c FROM clcommon__Party__c WHERE genesis__Application__c ='"+ approw.Id +"' AND clcommon__Type__r.Name = 'BORROWER' ORDER BY CreatedDate DESC LIMIT 1 ");
    var partyRow = partyData.getArray("records");
    
    var QuerydataResults = sforce.connection.query("SELECT Id,Name,APXTConga4__Name__c FROM APXTConga4__Conga_Merge_Query__c ");
    Querydata = QuerydataResults.getArray("records");
    console.log(Querydata);
    
    var templatesdataResults = sforce.connection.query("SELECT Id,Name,APXTConga4__Name__c FROM APXTConga4__Conga_Template__c ");
    Templatedata = templatesdataResults.getArray("records");
    console.log(Templatedata);
    
    var link1= '/apex/APXTConga4__Conga_Composer?&SolMgr=1';
    var date = new Date();
    var i,
    link2= '&Id='+approw.Id+
               '&QueryId=';
    var len = Querydata.length;
    for(i=0;i<len;i++){
        if(Querydata[i].APXTConga4__Name__c == 'Application Query')
            link2 += '[AQ]'+Querydata[i].Id+'%3Fpv0%3D'+approw.Id;
       
        if(Querydata[i].APXTConga4__Name__c == 'Adverse Action Query')
            link2 += ',[ADVACTION]'+Querydata[i].Id+'%3Fpv0%3D'+approw.Id;
        
        if(creditrow.length>0 &&  Querydata[i].APXTConga4__Name__c == 'Credit Report Query')
            link2 += ',[CREDITSCORE]'+Querydata[i].Id+'%3Fpv0%3D'+creditrow[0].Id;
        
        if(Querydata[i].APXTConga4__Name__c == 'Contact Query'){
            if(partyRow.length > 0)
                link2 += ',[CONTACT]'+Querydata[i].Id+'%3Fpv0%3D'+partyRow[0].clcommon__Contact__c;
            if(copartyRow.length > 0)
                link2 += ',[COBORROWER]'+Querydata[i].Id+'%3Fpv0%3D'+copartyRow[0].clcommon__Contact__c;
        }
        if(Querydata[i].APXTConga4__Name__c == 'Employer Query'){
            if(partyRow.length > 0)
                link2 += ',[EMPLOYER]'+Querydata[i].Id+'%3Fpv0%3D'+approw.Id+'%7Epv1%3D'+partyRow[0].clcommon__Contact__c;
            if(copartyRow.length > 0)    
                link2 += ',[COEMPLOYER]'+Querydata[i].Id+'%3Fpv0%3D'+approw.Id+'%7Epv1%3D'+copartyRow[0].clcommon__Contact__c;
        }
        
        if(Querydata[i].APXTConga4__Name__c == 'Previous Employer Query'){
            if(partyRow.length > 0)
                link2 += ',[PREEMPLOYER]'+Querydata[i].Id+'%3Fpv0%3D'+approw.Id+'%7Epv1%3D'+partyRow.clcommon__Contact__c;
            if(copartyRow.length > 0)
                link2 += ',[PRECOEMPLOYER]'+Querydata[i].Id+'%3Fpv0%3D'+approw.Id+'%7Epv1%3D'+copartyRow.clcommon__Contact__c;
        } 
        
        if(Querydata[i].APXTConga4__Name__c == 'Other Source Of Income Query'){
            if(partyRow.length > 0)
                link2 += ',[OTHERINCOME]'+Querydata[i].Id+'%3Fpv0%3D'+approw.Id+'%7Epv1%3D'+partyRow.clcommon__Contact__c;
            if(copartyRow.length > 0)
                link2 += ',[COOTHERINCOME]'+Querydata[i].Id+'%3Fpv0%3D'+approw.Id+'%7Epv1%3D'+copartyRow.clcommon__Contact__c;
        } 
        if(Querydata[i].APXTConga4__Name__c == 'Outstanding debts'){
            link2 += ',[DEBTS]'+Querydata[i].Id+'%3Fpv0%3D'+approw.Id;
        }
        if(Querydata[i].APXTConga4__Name__c == 'Asset Information'){
            link2 += ',[ASSETS]'+Querydata[i].Id+'%3Fpv0%3D'+approw.Id;
        }
        if(Querydata[i].APXTConga4__Name__c == 'Driver License Query'){
            if(partyRow.length > 0)
                link2 += ',[BORROWERDL]'+Querydata[i].Id+'%3Fpv0%3D'+approw.Id+'%7Epv1%3D'+partyRow.clcommon__Account__c;
            if(copartyRow.length > 0)
                link2 += ',[COBORROWERDL]'+Querydata[i].Id+'%3Fpv0%3D'+approw.Id+'%7Epv1%3D'+copartyRow.clcommon__Account__c;
        }
    }
    for(i=0;i<Templatedata.length;i++){
        if(params.row.clcommon__Category_Name__c == 'Adverse Action notice' &&  Templatedata[i].APXTConga4__Name__c == 'Adverse Action Letter - Non Real Estate')
            link2 += '&TemplateId='+Templatedata[i].Id;
        if(params.row.clcommon__Category_Name__c == 'Credit Application' && Templatedata[i].APXTConga4__Name__c == 'Consumer Credit Application - Non-Real Estate')
            link2 += '&TemplateId='+Templatedata[i].Id;
    }
    link2 +=  '&SC0=1&SC1=Attachments&DefaultPDF=1&DS7=7';    
    var finallink = link1+link2;
    window.open(finallink);
}catch(Exception){
    alert('Conga is not configured in this org.');
}

    var ret = sforce.apex.execute('genesis.ConvertApplicationCtrl','convertApplicationToContract',
    {

}

var integrationProvider = skuid.model.getModel('IntegrationProviderModel').data;
var providerUIModel = skuid.model.getModel('IntegrationProviderUIModel');
$.each(integrationProvider,function(i,row){
    let familyName = row.intframework__Integration_Family__r.Name;
    if (familyName == 'Consumer Credit') {
        providerUIModel.updateRow(providerUIModel.getFirstRow(), {
           isFicoActive : true
        });
    }else if (familyName == 'UCC') {
        providerUIModel.updateRow(providerUIModel.getFirstRow(), {
           isUCCActive : true
        });
    } else if (familyName == 'Documents And Disclosures') {
        providerUIModel.updateRow(providerUIModel.getFirstRow(), {
           isDocumentsAndDisclosures : true
        });
    } else if(familyName == 'KYC') {
        providerUIModel.updateRow(providerUIModel.getFirstRow(), {
           isKYCActive : true
        });
    } else if(familyName == 'KYB') {
        providerUIModel.updateRow(providerUIModel.getFirstRow(), {
           isKYBActive : true
        });
    }  else if(familyName == 'E Sign') {
        providerUIModel.updateRow(providerUIModel.getFirstRow(), {
           isESignActive : true
        });
	}
		else if(familyName == 'Corporate Information') {
        providerUIModel.updateRow(providerUIModel.getFirstRow(), {
           isCorporateInformationActive : true
        });
    }
});</jsitem><jsitem location="inlinesnippet" cachelocation="false" name="unlockRecord">var appModel = skuid.model.getModel('NGLDApplication');

setTimeout(function(){ 

    var policyConditionModel = skuid.model.getModel('PolicyException');
    var policyConditionValue;
    $.each(policyConditionModel.data, function(i, row) {
        var j = i+1;
        policyConditionValue = document.querySelector("#policyTable > div.nx-editor-contents > table > tbody > tr:nth-child(" + j + ") > td:nth-child(6) > div > div");
        
        if (policyConditionModel.getFieldValue(row, 'genesis__Status__c') === "Exception" ||
        policyConditionModel.getFieldValue(row, 'genesis__Status__c') === "Rejected") {
        policyConditionValue.classList.add("red-textbox");//red color
        } else if(policyConditionModel.getFieldValue(row, 'genesis__Status__c') === "In File" ||
            policyConditionModel.getFieldValue(row, 'genesis__Status__c') === "Pending" ) {
            policyConditionValue.classList.add("amber-textbox");//amber color
        }
        else {
            policyConditionValue.classList.add("blue-textbox");//blue color
        }
    });

}, 1000);</jsitem><jsitem location="inlinesnippet" cachelocation="false" name="updateApplicationOnPopup">var params = arguments[0],
	$ = skuid.$;
	
var message = skuid.utils.mergeAsText("global", "{{$Label.genesis__Save_Application}}");

$.blockUI({
    message: message,
    onBlock:function(){
        saveApplication();
    }
});	
function saveApplication(){
    var applicationM = skuid.model.getModel('NGLDApplication');
    var applicationData = applicationM.data[0];
    var newAppParams = {};
    var paramsMap = {};
    newAppParams.applicationM = applicationM;
    newAppParams.pmtstreamM = null;
    newAppParams.businessM = null;
    newAppParams.addressM = null;
    newAppParams.personalInfoM = null;
    newAppParams.accountM = null;
    newAppParams.contactM = null;
    newAppParams.changeDate = false;
    newAppParams.generateSchedule = false;
    
    paramsMap.generateSchedule = true;
    paramsMap.AddFeeToLoanAmount = true;
    newAppParams.mapForParameters = paramsMap;
    
    var result = saveNGApplicationV3(newAppParams);
    applicationData.updateApplication = false;
    $.unblockUI();
    location.reload();
}

	$ = skuid.$;
	
var message = skuid.utils.mergeAsText("global", "Please Wait While The Loan Is Booked To Core...");
$.blockUI({
message: message,
onBlock:function(){
BookCIFToCore();
}
});	
	
function BookCIFToCore(){
    var scModels = skuid.model.getModel('NGLDApplication');
    var scRow = scModels.data[0];
    var result = sforce.apex.execute('NLSBookToCoreCIFCalloutClass','bookToCoreCIFFromBackEnd',
        {
            applicationId : scRow.Id,
        });
    console.log(result);
    if(result == 'Success'){
        BookLoanToCore();
    }
    else{
        // alert('Result: ' + result);
        displayMessage(result);
        // location.reload();
        var exceptionPage = document.getElementById("ExceptionHeader");
        return exceptionPage.addEventListener("click", relodPage);
    }
}
function relodPage(event) {
    location.reload();
    return false;
}
        
function BookLoanToCore(){
    var scModels = skuid.model.getModel('NGLDApplication');
    var scRow = scModels.data[0];
    var result = sforce.apex.execute('NLSBookToCoreCalloutClass','bookToCoreLoanFromBackEnd',
    {
        applicationId : scRow.Id,
    });
    console.log(result);
    if(result != 'Success'){
        //alert('Result: ' + result);
        return displayMessage(result);
    }
    skuid.model.updateData([scModels],function(){
        $.unblockUI();
    });
}


var displayMessage = function (message) {
        console.log('error');
         $('#ExceptionHeader').data('object').editor.handleMessages([
            {
                message: message,
            }
        ]);
        $.unblockUI();
        return false;
    };</jsitem><jsitem location="inlinesnippet" cachelocation="false" name="generateModificationAgreeMaturity">var params = arguments[0],

ui-button iconic-button iconic-button-edit ui-state-focushtml {
    height: 100%;
}

body {
    background-color: #EBEEF0;
    font: normal normal 400 12px Lato;
    padding: 0 !important;
    height: 100%;
}

body > .nx-page {
    padding: 0;
    background-color: #EBEEF0;
}

.cls-dashboard-tab-content {
    position: absolute;
    top: 0;
    bottom: 0;
    left: 0;
    right: 0;
}

.cls-dashboard-tab-content .ui-tabs-nav {
    position: absolute;
    top: 0;
    height: 40px;
    left: 0;
    right: 0;
}

.cls-dashboard-tab-content > div.ui-tabs-panel {
    position: absolute;
    top: 46px;
    bottom: 6px;
    left: 0;
    right: 0;
}

#loan-dashboard-grid {
    margin: 0 !important;
}

#loan-panel {
    position: absolute;
    top: 0;
    bottom: 0;
    left: 0;
    width: 40%;
    margin: 0 !important;
}

#loan-right-panel {
    position: absolute;
    top: 0;
    bottom: 0;
    left: 40%;
    right: 0;
    margin: 0 0 0 10px !important;
}

#loan-panel .cls-dashboard-section {
    position: absolute;
    top: 0;
    bottom: 0;
    left: 0;
    right: 0;
}

#loan-panel .cls-dashboard-section .wrapper-title {
    position: absolute;
    top: 0;
    left: 0;
    right: 0;
}

#loan-panel .cls-dashboard-section .wrapper-container {
    position: absolute;
    top: 65px;
    bottom: 0;
    left: 0;
    right: 0;
}

#loan-panel .cls-dashboard-section .wrapper-container div {
    position: absolute;
    top: 0;
    bottom: 0;
    left: 0;
    right: 0;
}

#loan-dashboard-document-section{
    position: absolute;
    top: 0;
    bottom: 50%;
    left: 0;
    right: 0;
}

#loan-dashboard-parties-section {
    position: absolute;
    top: 50%;
    bottom: 0;
    left: 0;
    right: 0;
    margin: 0 !important;
}

#loan-dashboard-document-section div,
#loan-dashboard-parties-section div {
    position: absolute;
    top: 0;
    bottom: 0;
    left: 0;
    right: 0;
}

#relationship-dashboard,
#collateral-tab,
#construction-tab,
#approvals-dashboard{
    position: absolute;
    top: 0;
    bottom: 0;
    left: 0;
    right: 0;
    margin: 0 !important;
}

#construction-help {
    position: absolute;
    top: -42px;
    right: 10px;
    width: 28px;
    height: 28px;
    line-height: 28px;
    border: none !important;
}

#loan-details-iframe,
#document-iframe,
#party-iframe {
    border: none;
}

div[pagename="NGLoanDashBoard"] {
    position: absolute;
    top: 0;
    bottom: 0;
    left: 0;
    right: 0;
    overflow-y: hidden;
}

#skuid-component-tab-cls-originate-page-3 {

}

}

}
.fa-arrow-circle-right
{
